actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the determination of eligible basis in difficult development areas for the low-income housing credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to modify the determination of eligible basis in difficult development areas for the low-income housing credit by taking into account the adjusted basis of the real property upon which buildings are located.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the determination of eligible basis in difficult development areas for the low-income housing credit.
